subject: p10410641
raw_hist: Bilateral pigtails and possible left pneumothorax. Known right pneumothorax.
raw_find: There is a mild-to-moderate left pneumothorax with rightward mediastinal shift more apparent than on portable chest radiograph at 2:26 pm. The small right pneumothorax is stable. There is also a moderate left pleural effusion. Bilateral pigtail catheters are in place. The heart size remains normal. There is no focal consolidation.
raw_impr: New mild-to-moderate left pneumothorax with mild rightward shift of the mediastinum. Stable right pneumothorax. Moderate left pleural effusion. The case was discussed by Dr. With Dr.
